script.name: !move.collectware
script.description: Let ship collect ware flying around in an active sector
script.sourceplaintext:
skip if $wareobj -> exists return FLRET_INVALIDPARMS if $wareobj -> is of class Ware Container if [OWNER] != Player do if $wareobj ->get discovery points return FLRET_ERROR end $is.astronaut = null else if $wareobj -> is of class Astronaut $pilot = $wareobj ->get pilot speaker skip if [THIS] -> can transport passenger: $pilot return FLRET_NOCARGO $is.astronaut = [TRUE] else return null end
if not $destroy OR $is.astronaut $ware = $wareobj -> get ware type code of object skip if [THIS] -> can transport ware $ware return FLRET_NOCARGO $free = [THIS] -> get free amount of ware $ware in cargo bay skip if $free return FLRET_NOCARGO end
$doneStop = [FALSE] $tries = 0
$ware.lock = [THIS] -> get local variable: name='catch.lock' if not $ware.lock $ware.lock = table alloc [THIS] ->set local variable: name='catch.lock' value=$ware.lock end
$lock = $ware.lock[[OWNER]] if $lock != [THIS] if $lock -> exists if $lock -> is script !move.collectware on stack of task=0 return FLRET_NOCOMMANDS end end end
$ware.lock[[OWNER]] = [THIS]
do if [THIS] -> is docked @ = [THIS] -> call script !move.undock :
while 1 skip if $wareobj -> exists return null
$sector = $wareobj -> get sector if $sector != [ENVIRONMENT] @ $ret = [THIS] -> call script !move.movetosector : sector=$sector do if $ret == FLRET_NOPATH return $ret
@ = wait randomly from 250 to 500 ms continue end
if $destroy @ $ret = [THIS] -> move to ware object $wareobj for collecting: timeout=75000 ms if $ret == FLRET_FIREFREE = [THIS] -> fire lasers on target $wareobj using turret null @ = wait randomly from 250 to 500 ms do if $wareobj -> exists = [THIS] -> fire lasers on target $wareobj using turret null @ = wait 2000 ms do if $wareobj -> exists $wareobj ->destruct: show no explosion=[FALSE] return null end else
if $doneStop == [FALSE] AND $is.astronaut if $wareobj -> is docked @ = wait randomly from 100 to 200 ms return null end $dist = get distance between $wareobj and [THIS] $size = [THIS] -> get size of object if $dist > ( $size + 1000 ) @ = [THIS] -> follow $wareobj with precision 600 m : timeout=10000 ms continue else $doneStop = [TRUE] $wareobj ->start task 0 with script !lib.interrupt and prio 100: arg1=null arg2=null arg3=null arg4=null arg5=null continue end end
if $is.astronaut $time = 20000 else $time = 45000 end @ $ret = [THIS] -> move to ware object $wareobj for collecting: timeout=$time ms if $ret == FLRET_FIREFREE * ok, catch ware. if the ware is illegal and i am not a player ship, destroy it. $sectorowner = [SECTOR] -> get owner race if [OWNER] != Player AND [OWNER] == $sectorowner AND ! $is.astronaut if is ware $ware illegal in $sectorowner sectors = [THIS] -> fire lasers on target $wareobj using turret null * be sure the ware is destroyed @ = wait randomly from 250 to 500 ms do if $wareobj -> exists = [THIS] -> fire lasers on target $wareobj using turret null @ = wait 2000 ms do if $wareobj -> exists $wareobj ->destruct: show no explosion=[FALSE] return null end end $catchedamount = [THIS] -> catch ware object $wareobj return $catchedamount end if $wareobj -> exists if [THIS] -> has same environment as $wareobj $dist = get distance between [THIS] and $wareobj if $dist <= 1000 $catchedamount = [THIS] -> catch ware object $wareobj return $catchedamount end end end end
inc $tries = if $tries >= 3 $tries = 0 while $wareobj -> exists skip if [THIS] -> has same environment as $wareobj break $dist = get distance between [THIS] and $wareobj skip if $dist < 4500 break @ = [THIS] -> defensive move: type=1, intensity=100, timeout=10000ms, avoid object=$wareobj end end
*skip if $ret == FLRET_INTERRUPTED *return null
@ = wait randomly from 100 to 200 ms end return null

line.text: get ware type code of object

comment.var: ok, catch ware. if the ware is illegal and i am not a player ship, destroy it.
be sure the ware is destroyed

sval.val: Let ship collect ware flying around in an active sector
ok, catch ware. if the ware is illegal and i am not a player ship, destroy it.
be sure the ware is destroyed
